quotes: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
You don't need a weatherman to know which way the wind blows.
To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.
Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
Throw your heart over the bar and your body will follow.
The businessman's tool is value.
Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea.
You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess.
By seeking and blundering we learn.
Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.
A strong man overcomes an obstacle, a wise man goes the whole way.
You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
Everything has beauty but not everyone sees it.
The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.
From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own.
Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them.
Success is getting what you want... Happiness is wanting what you get.
Never settle for the crumbs of life.
Time heals what reason cannot.
Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goals.
If you want to know what God thinks about money just look at the people He gives it to.
If you see yourself as prosperous, you will be.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
If I persist long enough I will win.
The greatest doer must also be a great dreamer.
Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.
What kills the creative force is not age or lack of talent, but our own spirit, our own attitude.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind.
We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
Wheels of justice grind slow but grind fine.
Anger, ego, jealousy are the biggest diseases,Keep yourself aloof from these three diseases.
We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it.
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Being a good example is the best form of service.
Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
Leadership starts at the top.
Talent is luck. The important thing in life is courage.
Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
